short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to shuffle the order of products on Product Hunt and hide already seen launches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shuffle the order of products on Product Hunt and hide already seen launches to easily discover new products.
